name: Endless Zombie Survival
description:
Endless Zombie Survival is a top-down shooter. An endless horde of zombies will try to kill you, but you can stop the zombies by shooting them. Collect yellow power-ups to replenish ammo, and red power-ups to replenish health.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • R key to reload
  • P key to pause
  • Esc key to Quit
